title: Corporate Whistle Blowers Get Supreme Court Hearing (Audio)
itunes:title: Corporate Whistle Blowers Get Supreme Court Hearing (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Robert Hockett, a professor at Cornell University Law School, discusses the Supreme Court's decision to take on a case, which could change federal protections for whistle blowers under the Dodd-Frank Act. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
